Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $1500000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price of $1200000. This represents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit from this high-value transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
